bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there are yellow object and black object together, don't pack a black object into the box
goals.3: If there is a yellow object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: avoid handling and moving any box
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.4: when a rigid object in the bin at the initial state, out of the rigid object and replace it into the bin
